member.name: F:YamlDotNet.Serialization.SerializationOptions.DisableAliases
member.summary: If this flag is specified, if the same object appears more than once in the serialization graph, it will be serialized each time instead of just once.
member.remarks: If the serialization graph contains circular references and this flag is set, a StackOverflowException will be thrown. If this flag is not set, there is a performance penalty because the entire object graph must be walked twice.
